title: Stack Options
description: Synth an app via the `cdk` cli command.

name.description: Use the indicated name for as the cdk stack project name
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the cdk project name?

profile.description: Use the indicated AWS profile as the default environment
profile.x-prompt: What profile would you want to assume (profile from ~/.aws/config) ([profile <profile_name>) ?

region.description: Use the indicated AWS profile as the default environment
region.x-prompt: What region would you want to deploy to ?

directory.description: Use the indicated directory under apps/<directory> for as the cdk stack project directory

vpcId.description: The vpc-id for this serverless application to live on
vpcId.x-prompt: What vpc id will this application be deployed to ?

vpcPrivateSubnetIds.description: Array of vpc private subnet ids
vpcPrivateSubnetIds.x-prompt: Type in vpc private subnetids (minimum 1)? id1,id2,id3

subnets.x-prompt: What subnet ids will this application use? id1,id2,id3

x-prompt.message: Which availability zones would you like to use?

handlers.x-prompt: What hadlers functions should be mapped to lambda functions (will map in linear order)? 'a','b','c'

functionNames.x-prompt: Function names for your lambda functions (will map in linear order)? 'a','b','c'

x-prompt.message: Which event sources would you like to use?
